channel.title: AWS Account on Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in AWS Account on Workshop

item.title: Workshop Portal
item.description: Login to AWS Workshop Portal This workshop creates an AWS acccount and a Cloud9 environment. You will need the Participant Hash provided upon entry, and your email address to track your unique session. Connect to the portal by clicking the button or browsing to https://portal.awsworkshop.io/. Connect to Portal Enter your Participant Hash and your email address, and click Log In. Once you have been logged in, please first log into the AWS console by clicking on the button.
